mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTENTS(contCode, boardCode, contTitle, contWriter, contContent, contDate, contUpDate, contViews) VALUES (USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 1, #{contTitle}, #{contWriter}, #{contContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{contViews})
